Text:
@C41337

What seems to be the problem? Does it run and close, does it not recognize command, errors? I need some info to troubleshoot and see what the problem may be.
I can't figure out how to get the installer to work.
Well it starts up the installer normally, I then waited ten minutes and it wasn't installed yet, so I checked the details bar and it said cannot find xaos.jar

@C41337

Right-click on the .app, Click "Show Package Contents", Contents > Resources, Then verify that "twnz.zip" is located there, if it is delete the file "delete_me_to_reinstall.txt" then start the application up and it should re-install the unnecessary files.

@haydenhayden011

I need some more info before I can see what the problem is.
I did as you said the only problem was that all I got in the resources folder was: appIcon.icns appsettings.plist mainmenu.nib and script
